title: Toto - Toto IV [SACD] upmix DTS 5.1ch @1411kbps
description:
Toto - Toto IV [SACD] upmix DTS 5.1ch @1411kbps

The audio source is the SACD 2.0 (Remaster 1999), I ripped it in PCM 32/88.2kHz
 
The upmix treatment was done with Audition CC in a professionnal studio.


-----------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------

Torrent content:

1 - Rosanna.dts
2 - Make Believe.dts
3 - I Won't Hold You Back.dts
4 - Good For You.dts
5 - It's A Feeling.dts
6 - Afraid Of Love.dts
7 - Lovers In The Night.dts
8 - We Made It.dts
9 - Waiting For Your Love.dts
10 - Africa.dts

*.dts files were encoded with SurCode CD/DVD DTS @44.1kHz/1411kbps(DTS Data Rate 1234kbps)

-----------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------

How to use ?

You can play files on your computer with Foobar2000 with the plugin DTS.

Or you can burn a CD-DTS like a CD-Audio simply by changing .dts extension by .wav then adding them to the burn list of your burning software (nero). The CD-DTS can be played on a DVD player connected to a home cinema amplifier via a digital connection (Optical Toslink, Coaxial or HDMI).
